name: Neurology
title: Our Hospital Always Provide Good Services
subTitle: Neurology is a branch of medicine dealing with disorders of the nervous system. Neurology deals with the diagnosis
descripton: A neurologist is a physician specializing in neurology and trained to investigate, or diagnose and treat neurological disorders.[2] Neurologists treat a myriad of neurologic conditions, including stroke, seizures, movement disorders such as Parkinson's disease, autoimmune neurologic disorders such as multiple sclerosis, headache disorders like migraine and dementias such as Alzheimer's disease.
